scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: In these three typed letters to Dr. Herbert Cannon Lipscomb, Chairman of the Classics Department at Randolph Macon Women's College, dated March 2, March 17, and May 15, 1967, Juliet Brooke Ballard asks for his help in locating references to psychic phenomena in ancient sources for use in the Association of Research and Enlightenment Journaledited by Ballard. She also mentions sending him a copy of Lucia Clark Markham's Sonnets to the Belovedfor his enjoyment.
